Package ohos.system.version

Class SystemVersion

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.system.version.SystemVersion

  • public class SystemVersion
extends Object
    A static class pertaining to the system version.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Startup.SysInfo

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SystemVersion​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static int getApiVersion​()
      Obtains the API version number.
      static int getBuildVersion​()
      Obtains the build (B) version number, which increases with each new development build.
      static int getFeatureVersion​()
      Obtains the feature (F) version number, which increases with any planned new features.
      static int getMajorVersion​()
      Obtains the major (M) version number, which increases with any updates to the overall architecture.
      static String getReleaseType​()
      Obtains the OS release type.
      static int getSeniorVersion​()
      Obtains the senior (S) version number, which increases with any updates to the partial architecture or major features.
      static String getVersion​()
      Obtains the version number represented by a string in the following format: Major version number.Senior version number.Feature version number.Build version number.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SystemVersion

        public SystemVersion​()

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        public static String getVersion​()
        Obtains the version number represented by a string in the following format: Major version number.Senior version number.Feature version number.Build version number.

        Leading zeros are not required even if the major, senior, or feature version number is less than two digits, or if the build version number is less than three digits. If the OS release type obtained from getReleaseType() is not Release), the version number is in the following format: Major version number.Senior version number.Feature version number.Build version number Release type

        Returns:
        Returns a string representing the version number.
        Since:
        3

      • getMajorVersion

        public static int getMajorVersion​()
        Obtains the major (M) version number, which increases with any updates to the overall architecture.

        The M version number monotonically increases from 1 to 99.

        Returns:
        Returns the M version number.
        Since:
        4

      • getSeniorVersion

        public static int getSeniorVersion​()
        Obtains the senior (S) version number, which increases with any updates to the partial architecture or major features.

        The S version number monotonically increases from 0 to 99.

        Returns:
        Returns the S version number.
        Since:
        4

      • getFeatureVersion

        public static int getFeatureVersion​()
        Obtains the feature (F) version number, which increases with any planned new features.

        The F version number monotonically increases from 0 or 1 to 99.

        Returns:
        Returns the F version number.
        Since:
        3

      • getBuildVersion

        public static int getBuildVersion​()
        Obtains the build (B) version number, which increases with each new development build.

        The B version number monotonically increases from 0 or 1 to 999.

        Returns:
        Returns the B version number.
        Since:
        3

      • getReleaseType

        public static String getReleaseType​()
        Obtains the OS release type.

        The OS release category can be Release, Beta, or Canary. The specific release type may be Release, Beta1, or others alike.

        Returns:
        Returns the OS release type.
        Since:
        4

      • getApiVersion

        public static int getApiVersion​()
        Obtains the API version number.

        Mappings between versions and API versions:

         Version        API Version
 1.0                1
 1.1                2
 2.0.0              3
 2.0.1              4
 2.1.0              5
        Returns:
        Returns the API version number.
        Since:
        3
